titleStmt.title: The tryal of Nathanael Thompson, John Farewell, William Pain before the Right Honourable Sir Fran. Pemberton, Kt., Lord Chief Justice of England, by nisi prius at Guild-Hall, London, the twentieth of June, 1682, for writing and publishing scandalous letters to Mr. Miles Prance, in relation to the death of Sir Edmund-bury Godfrey
titleStmt.author: Thompson, Nathaniel, d. 1687, defendant.
Pemberton, Francis, Sir, 1624-1697.
Prance, Miles, fl. 1678-1689, defendant.
Paine, William, defendant.
Farwell, John, defendant.
England and Wales. Court of King's Bench.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
